Contribution

Gurukulams

Gurukulams is an open-source initiative dedicated to transforming traditional textbooks into dynamic, interactive digital resources. Our platform goes beyond standard PDFs by offering enriched features to enhance the learning experience.

We currently provide government school textbooks (with additional questions for NEET/JEE) and advanced computer science resources for college students preparing for interviews.

Technologies Used:
  • Content Preparation: Markdown, KaTeX, Goat Diagrams, Reveal.js
  • Version Control: Git, GitHub (PRs, issues, GitOps, Kanban methodology)
  • Architecture: Micro frontend with modular GitHub repositories and CI/CD pipelines
  • Delivery: Hugo for server-side rendering and live content updates

As a project member, I contribute to Git-based workflows, task management, and PR reviews, helping to modernize the educational experience for students.

Project Links: Government School Books | Computer Science Books
